sentences.en: ‘I took you out.’ ‘To a motel! That's just about your mark!’.
sentences.cn: ‘我带你出去。’‘去汽车旅馆！你就爱这样’。

sentences.en: "Frankly I found it rather frightening." — "A little startling," Mark agreed.
sentences.cn: “坦白说我觉得这相当可怕。”——“是有点吓人，”马克表示同意。

sentences.en: a burn mark on the kitchen table
sentences.cn: 厨房餐桌上的一块烧痕

sentences.en: A simple wooden cross marked her grave.
sentences.cn: 一个简单的木十字架标出了她坟墓的位置。

sentences.en: All school uniform should be clearly marked with the child’s name.
sentences.cn: 所有校服都应该清晰地标明学生的名字。

sentences.en: Campaigners lit scores of bonfires in ceremonies to mark the anniversary.
sentences.cn: 参加运动的人们在各种仪式上点起一垛垛篝火以纪念周年庆典。

sentences.en: celebrations to mark Australia Day
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚国庆节的庆祝活动

sentences.en: Harry had carefully bought and wrapped presents for Mark to give them.
sentences.cn: 哈里精心购置了礼物又仔细包好，让马克交给他们。

sentences.en: He did well to get such a good mark.
sentences.cn: 他表现不错，得了这么高的分数。

sentences.en: he had been a man of mark.
sentences.cn: 他曾经是个显赫人物。

sentences.en: he left his mark on English football.
sentences.cn: 他对英国足球运动影响深远。

sentences.en: He used a rope to mark off the circle.
sentences.cn: 他用绳子把那个圈围了起来。

sentences.en: Her marks have been a lot lower this term.
sentences.cn: 她这学期的成绩差多了。

sentences.en: His feet left dirty marks all over the floor.
sentences.cn: 他的脚踩得地板上到处都是污迹。

sentences.en: his solutions are completely off the mark.
sentences.cn: 他的解决办法完全不正确。

sentences.en: I can’t get these marks out of my T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 我无法把我T恤衫上的这些污迹去掉。

sentences.en: I tend to forget things unless I mark them down.
sentences.cn: 除非把事情记下来，否则我常常会忘事。

sentences.en: I was persuaded, against my better judgement, mark you, to vote for him.
sentences.cn: 我被说服投了他的票，请注意，这不符合我的理智判断。

sentences.en: I’ve marked the pages you need to look at.
sentences.cn: 我把你需要看的几页做了记号。

sentences.en: It took a moment for Mark to recover his poise.
sentences.cn: 马克过了一会儿才恢复镇静。

sentences.en: Make a mark at the bottom of the page.
sentences.cn: 在页末做个记号。

sentences.en: Mark was condemned to do most of the work.
sentences.cn: 马克被迫承担大部分工作。

sentences.en: Mark was dragged from the burning wreckage of his car.
sentences.cn: 马克被人从他着火的汽车残骸中拉了出来。

sentences.en: Mark was out of earshot, walking ahead of them.
sentences.cn: 马克走在前面，听不见他们的声音。

sentences.en: Mark was palmed off with a series of excuses.
sentences.cn: 马克被一连串借口打发了。

sentences.en: Mark, you'd better get cracking, the sooner the better.
sentences.cn: 马克，你最好尽快开始，越快越好。

sentences.en: Mrs Lawson was presented with a gold watch to mark the occasion .
sentences.cn: 劳森太太被赠予一块金表作为纪念。

sentences.en: on your marks, get set, go!.
sentences.cn: 各就位，预备，跑！。

sentences.en: Quietly Mark poured and served drinks for all of them.
sentences.cn: 马克一声不响地给他们每人倒好饮料并端上来。

sentences.en: Robinson didn't think the story was so far off the mark.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊认为这个报道根本算不上离谱。

sentences.en: She always gets good marks .
sentences.cn: 她成绩一直很好。

sentences.en: The kitten is mainly white with black marks on her back.
sentences.cn: 小猫身体基本为白色，背上有黑色斑点。

sentences.en: The skid marks (= marks left by a car’s tyres ) were over 30 feet long.
sentences.cn: 打滑痕迹有30多英尺长。

sentences.en: The young man led Mark Ryle along a corridor.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人领着马克·赖尔沿走廊而去。

sentences.en: to say he was their legal adviser would be nearer the mark.
sentences.cn: 说他是他们的法律顾问更贴切一些。

sentences.en: What do those strange marks at the top mean?
sentences.cn: 顶端那些奇怪的记号是什么意思？

words.tran_cn: 记分员；书签；标识物；作记号的人
表示（mark的过去分词）；作记号；打分数
注意；作记号于；给…打分数（mark的ing形式）

phrases.phrase: be quick (或 slow) off the mark

phrases.tran_cn: ◎操行良好的标记；良好的评分
打中目标；达到目的；成功

phrases.phrase: leave (或 make) its (或 one's，或 a) mark

phrases.tran_cn: 减价：降低待卖商品的价格
n. 马克·吐温（美国小说家）
(英)（某人）风格，特别适合（某人）之事
唛头；发货标记；装运标志
n. 水位标志；潮汐标尺；水印

trans.tran_cn: 斑点，污渍，记号，成绩，评价，标准，迹象，马克，刻度，（汽车等）型，花押，靶子 ，Mark （男子名）马克
trans.tran_en: a cut, hole, or other small sign of damage

trans.tran_cn: 做记号，留下印迹，标示，纪念，表明，给…评分，赋予特征，留心，盯住(对方球员)
trans.tran_en: to write or draw on something, so that someone will notice what you have written
